post.description: Authenticate a user with the given credentials and return a JWT token.
Creates a new user account and returns a confirmation.

get.description: Verifies the authenticity of the provided authentication token.
Retrieves a list of users blocked by the authenticated user.

parameters.description: The number of blocks to return.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: The number of blocks to offset the returned blocks by.
parameters.name: offset

get.description: Retrieves a list of posts bookmarked by the authenticated user.

parameters.description: The number of bookmarks to return.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: The number of bookmarks to offset the returned bookmarks by. For example, offset=10&count=10 would return bookmarks 10-20
parameters.name: offset

get.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's feed, sorted by an algorithm to highlight relevant content.
Retrieves the authenticated user's feed, sorted by the time of the post's creation.
Retrieves a feed of trending or recommended content for the authenticated user to discover.
Retrieves a list of files uploaded by the authenticated user.

post.description: Uploads a new file and assigns it to the authenticated user.

delete.description: Deletes the specified file from the authenticated user's uploaded files.

get.description: Retrieve likes. If a like ID is provided, it is always used. Otherwise, a postID will return all likes for that post. If a userID is also provided, it will return either the like for that user/post or an empty array. If only a userID is provided, it will return all likes by that user for any post.
Search for posts with query parameters.

parameters.description: The number of posts to return.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: The number of posts to offset the returned posts by.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The privacy setting of the post
parameters.name: privacy

parameters.description: The UUIDs of the media files attached to the post
parameters.name: mediaIDs

post.description: Adds the specified post to the authenticated user's bookmarks.

delete.description: Removes the specified post from the authenticated user's bookmarks.

post.description: Create a new like for a post.

delete.description: Delete a like for a post.

get.description: Search for users with query parameters.

parameters.description: The number of users to return.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: The number of users to offset the returned users by.
parameters.name: offset

delete.description: Confirm the deletion of the authenticated user's profile.

get.description: Retrieves a list of users following the authenticated user.
get.summary: Retrieve Users Who are Following the Authenticated User

parameters.description: The number of follows to return.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: The number of follows to offset the returned follows by.
parameters.name: offset

get.description: Retrieves a list of users the authenticated user is following.
get.summary: Retrieve Users that the Authenticated User is Following

parameters.description: The number of follows to return.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: The number of follows to offset the returned follows by.
parameters.name: offset

post.description: Blocks the specified user from interacting with the authenticated user.

delete.description: Removes block on the specified user, allowing them to interact with the authenticated user.

get.description: Get a list of all users that are following a user by user ID
get.summary: Get Users Who are Following the Specified User

post.description: Follow a user by user ID
post.summary: Follow a user by user ID

delete.description: Unfollow a user by user ID
delete.summary: Unfollow a user by user ID

get.description: Get a list of all users that a user is following by user ID
get.summary: Get Users that the Specified User is Following

parameters.description: The number of likes to return.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: The number of likes to offset the returned likes by.
parameters.name: offset
